Articles.Content:
This post was originally made asking for more options regarding the revert feature, but most if not all of the features that I requested are already in game.

Edited June 23, 2023 by BowlerHatGuy3
The option to turn off/turn on revert is already in the game.
That belongs in difficulty settings. If someone wants to turn reverts off, let them do so.

6 hours ago, BowlerHatGuy3 said:

So the revert feature in the game isn’t really working too well tight now but that’s beside the point.

Do you think the revert feature should be removed from certain gamemodes in KSP2? I think career mode and multiplayer are good candidates. Multiplayer for more obvious reasons but career for gameplay. I think that being able to revert a launch in the career mode would kinda make rocket launches less exciting, as if anything were to go wrong you could just turn back time as if nothing happened. Imo it’d be better to create a sim mode that you could go to in the VAB, where you could test certain aspects of your craft to reduce the chance of failures. What do you guys think?

Is already in the game under difficult settings
I'm definitely an advocate for this if we can have a high-fidelity sim mode (and as long as there aren't game-breaking bugs!).

6 hours ago, Lowi_Sace said:

Is already in the game under difficult settings

It is? Well, guess I need to play the game more.
